meanings.sent1: She accidentally underheated the soup, so it was still cold.

meanings.sent3: The underheating of the room made everyone shiver.
meanings.sent4: His lack of attention underheated the relationship, causing it to cool off.
meanings.sent5: The underheating of the water made it impossible to take a warm bath.

meanings.definition: The act of not providing enough heat.
meanings.sent1: The underheating of the house led to a chilly atmosphere.
meanings.sent2: Underheating in winter can be uncomfortable for the residents.
meanings.sent3: The underheating of the fireplace made the gathering less cozy.
meanings.sent4: The underheating of the classroom made it hard to focus on the lesson.
meanings.sent5: The underheating of the office caused everyone to wear extra layers.
